short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the vastness of the universe with the Space Portal Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension features a mesmerizing portal that opens into the infinite expanse of space, surrounded by stars, nebulae, and distant galaxies. The dynamic animation creates a sense of adventure and exploration, making your browsing experience feel like a journey through the cosmos every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🌌 Stunning live wallpaper of a space portal opening into the universe.
🌐 Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display to help you stay on schedule.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts for easy navigation to your favorite websites.
Let the wonders of the cosmos enhance your browsing experience, with a captivating space portal right at your fingertips.
